Glen Earl Boothe (amụrụ na Machị 8, 1988), nke a maara dị ka Knxwledge (nke a na-akpọ "ihe ọmụma"), bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na ónyé na-ede egwu nke dị na Los Angeles, California. Kemgbe afọ 2009, o nweela ihe karịrị 100 ntọhapụ site na Bandcamp
N'afọ 2010, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Klouds site na All City
N'afọ 2012, o wepụtara nchịkọta egwu 53 na cassette, nke Leaving Records wepụtara
Abụ ya na-abụkarị ngwakọta nkè ụdị dị íchè íchè, dị ka jazz, mkpụrụ obi, hip hop ochie, na rap nke oge a.

N'afọ 2015, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya màkà Stones Throw Records, Hud Dreems, ma mepụta egwu "Momma" na Kendrick Lamar's junior release, To Pimp a Butterfly, nke gárá n'ihu merie Best Rap Album na 58th kwa afọ Grammy Awards na 2016. Ọrụ ya na Anderson.Paak dị ka duo NxWorries enwetala otuto dị egwu
Na Machị 2020 ọ wepụtara 1988, abọm nke abụọ ya màkà Stones Throw
